Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: simple bedroom

This simple room is drab in color and utilitarian in purpose. A fireplace is set against the northern wall while the door leads west into the hallway. Free of any decoration or unnecessary items, the bed and a small table stand stark as the only real furnishings.

This simple room is drab in color and utilitarian in purpose. A fireplace is set against the northern wall while the door leads west into the hallway. Free of any decoration or unnecessary items, the bed and a small table stand stark as the only real furnishings.

This simple room is drab in color and utilitarian in purpose. A fireplace is set against the northern wall while the door leads west into the hallway. Free of any decoration or unnecessary items, the bed and a small table stand stark as the only real furnishings.
a wooden door leading west
A rectangular wooden door in the middle of the western wall leads to the hallway. A simple latch and lock are fitted to the door. $(parent-desc)
small bed
The single-person bed is covered simple white sheets. A flat pillow marks the head of the bed. A folded grey blanket rests at the foot.
The bed is covered with simple white sheets. A pillow rests at the head and a folded grey blanket lays at the foot.
a grey comforter
The bed's grey comforter is neatly folded and looks very used.
The bed's grey comforter.
the ceiling
Thick, dark oak joists, sagging and uneven, cross the ceiling about eight feet overhead. They support wide wooden planks, which have been plastered and whitewashed.
There seems to be a ceiling overhead in this dark room, supported by thick wooden beams.
Thick, dark wooden joists, sagging and uneven, cross the ceiling about eight feet overhead in this dim room. They support wide wooden planks, which have been plastered.
Thick wooden joists, sagging and uneven, cross the ceiling. They support wide wooden planks, which have been plastered and whitewashed.
There seems to be a ceiling not far above your head in this dark room.
This dim room has a ceiling of thick, sagging wooden beams supporting plastered planks.
the chimney
The fieldstone chimney rises, as a continuation of the fireplace, against the northern wall to the ceiling. There is no mantel or shelf on the chimney.
The stone chimney rises, as a continuation of the fireplace, against the northern wall.
The stone chimney rises, as a continuation of the fireplace, against the northern wall to the ceiling.
the northeast corner
The northeast corner of the room.
The northeast corner of a dark room.
The northeast corner of the dim room.
The northeast corner of the room.
The northeast corner of a dark room.
The northeast corner of the dim room.
the northwest corner
The northwest corner of the room.
The northwest corner of a dark room.
The northwest corner of the dim room.
The northwest corner of the room.
The northwest corner of a dark room.
The northwest corner of the dim room.
the southeast corner
The southeast corner of the room.
The southeast corner of a dark room.
The southeast corner of the dim room.
The southeast corner of the room.
The southeast corner of a dark room.

the southwest corner
The southwest corner of the room.
The southwest corner of a dark room.
The southwest corner of the dim room.
The southwest corner of the room.
The southwest corner of a dark room.
The southwest corner of the dim room.
the fire

Base:Description.night: A cheerful fire is burning on a few logs within the hearth.
Base:Description.day: A fire is barely burning on a few logs within the hearth.

Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the fireplace
Set against the middle of the northern wall is a field stone fireplace. The arched hearth opening contains a crackling fire.
Set against the northern wall is a stone fireplace. The hearth contains a barely-alive fire.
Set against the northern wall is a fireplace, in which a fire is dimly burning.
the floor
The floor is made from smooth oak planks, of various widths. The planks are not entirely evenly laid, and some have warped slightly, so that the floor is a bit uneven.
The uneven floor of a dark room is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths.
The floor of the dim room is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths. The floor is warped and a bit unevenly laid.
The floor is made from smooth oak planks, of various widths. The planks are not entirely evenly laid, and some have warped slightly, so that the floor is a bit uneven.
The floor is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths.
The floor is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths. The floor is a bit uneven.
table leg
The legs of this {simple|small|small, simple} wooden table are smooth wooden posts, attached to the corners of the table top.
The table legs are smooth, simple wooden posts.
the middle of the room
The middle of the room.
The middle of a dark room.
The middle of the dim room.
The middle of the room.
The middle of a dark room.
The middle of the dim room.
a pillow
A flat pillow of no distinction.
A flat pillow.
simple white sheets
The bed is covered with simple white sheets. They look worn through.
The bed is covered with simple white sheets.
small, simple table
This is a small, simple, four-legged wooden table. The top is smooth and unmarked.
A small, simple table.
A small, simple wooden table.
the tavern
You are within The Copper Claw, a tavern in Rinascita.
table top
The smooth, unmarked table top is a rectangular surface.
The top of the table is made of smooth, unmarked wood.
the eastern wall

The close-studded, half-timbered eastern wall is constructed of dark, unpainted oak posts (the studs) and a few diagonal arch-braces, joined with mortises and pegs, and all somewhat less than perfectly flat and square. Few of the studs are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. The arch-braces rise from some of the larger posts, and curve slightly 'inward' as they rise to support the ceiling beams. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, whitewashed plaster, laid over laths or wattle-work covered with clay mixed with horse-hair. These panels are recessed about half an inch beyond the surrounding wooden framing. The wall is about eight feet high.
The half-timbered eastern wall of this dark room is constructed of wooden posts and diagonal braces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough plaster.

The close-studded, half-timbered eastern wall of this dim room is constructed of oak posts and diagonal braces, somewhat less than perfectly flat and square -- not all are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.

The close-studded, half-timbered eastern wall is constructed of oak posts and diagonal braces, somewhat less than perfectly flat and square -- not all are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.
The eastern side of this dark room seems to be a wall, built of wood and plaster.
The half-timbered eastern wall of this dim room is constructed of wooden posts and diagonal braces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.

casement window
A simple casement window is built into the northern wall. Through the window:
